entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Savant Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:15 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sioux Lookout Airport 8:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 0.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 58 %
Dewpoint: -7.0°C
Wind: S 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening then light overnight. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning with risk of freezing drizzle. High plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.summary: Snow. High minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023
